Ward.definition: a division of a city for representative

1.definition: a division of a city for representative, electoral, or administrative purposes

2 a.definition: a person who by reason of incapacity (as minority or incompetency) is under the control of a guardian

sub_terms.b: a person who by reason of incapacity is under the protection of a court either directly or through a guardian appointed by the court called alsocompare
